wikipedia_page.main: Joshua Cardwell (1910–1982) was a Unionist politician in Northern Ireland.

response: Joshua Cardwell, an east Belfast Unionist Party of Northern Ireland (UPNI) councillor and Stormont MP who formerly chaired the Belfast Corporation Welfare Committee responsible for children's homes, committed suicide in 1982 after making a statement to the RUC in March over Kincora.
